short_summary: Procurement of reconnaissance, planning and management of invasive plant species at Big Creek and Long Point National Wildlife Areas
description: Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) has a requirement for reconnaissance, planning and management of 100-200 hectares of invasive species in Big Creek National Wildlife Area and Long Point National Wildlife Area. The project includes herbicide application and/or non-herbicide mechanical removal, mowing, rolling, cutting and/or burning to reduce high density dead vegetation. Work plan, invasive species management plan, and biannual reports are included.
full_summary:
**Reconnaissance, Planning, and Management of Invasive Plant Species at National Wildlife Areas**
=============================================

**Information about the Tender**
-------------------------------

*   **Title**: Reconnaissance, planning and management of invasive plant species at the Big Creek and Long Point National Wildlife Areas
*   **Reference Number**: cb-493-6205188
*   **Solicitation Number**: 5000080497
*   **Publication Date**: 2024-06-12
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-08T15:00:00
*   **Status**: Expired

**Project Overview**
------------------

Environment and Climate Change Canada requires the reconnaissance, planning, and management of invasive plant species at the Big Creek National Wildlife Area (BCNWA) and Long Point National Wildlife Area (LPNWA).

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The scope of work includes:

*   Identifying and locating invasive species over approximately 100-200 hectares of area
*   Developing a management plan for the identified species
*   Implementing primary (herbicide application and/or non-herbicide mechanical removal) and secondary (mowing, rolling, cutting, and/or burning) techniques to control the invasive species
*   Creating a work plan, invasive species management plan, and biannual reports

**Key Details**
----------------

*   **Period of Contract**: Contract award date to March 31, 2025, with option to renew for one additional one-year period
*   **Location**: Big Creek National Wildlife Area and Long Point National Wildlife Area in Ontario (excluding NCR)
*   **Evaluation Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**How to Participate**
----------------------

If you are interested in submitting a bid, please refer to the tender documents, which can be downloaded from the following links:

*   English version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/40121/5000080497-en-rfp-canadabuys.pdf
*   French version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/40121/5000080497-fr-rfp-canadabuys.pdf

For more information or to submit a bid, please contact Angelina Garcia at Angelina.Garcia@ec.gc.ca or (778) 726-1680.
